products.title: Orient Faux Silk Dusky Rose Pink Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Orient Faux Silk Dusky Rose Pink Roman Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £14.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Orient Faux-Silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This Dusky Rose Pink faux-silk roman blind, introduces a dark pink shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with our hand-made roman blinds. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Velvet Petal Pink Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Velvet Petal Pink Roman Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £17.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home.  A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day.  From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. 
 
This soft roman blind in Petal Pink, introduces a soft light pink hue to your home.  This smooth rose-coloured fabric connotes feelings of creativity and passion, and this velvet pink roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this roman blind made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our roman blinds are made to last.  Our roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!  
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1160 Fabric Colour: Petal Pink Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1270mm
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 50% Cotton / 50% Polyester and Polyester Embroidery
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
